title: Dad's corned beef
ingredients: ['1.5kg beef joint - silverside', '2 tbsp sugar', '125ml vinegar', 'handful of whole cloves', 'handful of black peppercorns', '1-2 bay leaves', 'White mustard sauce', '1 tbsp margarine', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '1 tbsp plain flour - I use wheat free flour', '180ml milk', 'reserved juices from the pot to make up liquid in the sauce (approx 125ml)']
